controllerServices.name: Avro Writer - HWX SR Registry - HWX Content Encode

labels.label: Serialize CSV into Avro by fetching Schema associated with kafka topic from the HWX Schema REgistry.
Parse, Route, and Enrich the Data

processGroups.name: Publish Enriched Streams Kafka Syndication Services

labels.label:
Upstream app is sending CSV events with schema name in Kafka Message Header.
Use ConsumeKafkaRecord do the following 1. Grab the schema name from Kafka Header and store in Attribute called schema.name 2. Use the schema name to look up the Schema in HWX SR 3. Use the schema from HWX SR to convert to ProcessRecords 4. Route events by event source (speed or geo) using SQL

processGroups.name: Acquire Events from Kafka IOT Gateways
